Name: L. Maupin
Reviews: I got this as a gift from my best friend.  She went all out loading it with Ram and a Sata Drive. I cannot believe how fast it is.  As soon as I hit the last digit for my password (when signing in) BOOM! It loads.  It s backlit which is a God send.  It os super slim, and lightweight.  All of my laptops have had trouble "WAITING FOR CACHE" in Chrome.  No more.  Nothing ever gets hung up.  I never wait for a page to load.  The touch pad was odd, so I went in and re-set the whole thing and I NEVER have a problem with it anymore.  I went in to taskmanager and turned off things running in the background, and did the same in Settings.  (Open Settings. Click on Privacy. Click on Background apps. Under the "Choose which apps can run in the background" section, turn off the toggle switch for the apps you want to restrict)  So these made it faster also.  I use this thing sometmes 12 hours a day and it has been a joy. I am so happy the seller made this build possible.

Name: J Williams
Titles: Great specs, but super loud fan and REALLY SLOW
Reviews: Bought mine from Costco thankfully so it was super easy to return.  The fan is louder than an airplane - seriously it's so loud it's giving me a headache.  Which I might overlook if I didn't spend all my time on this computer waiting for something to happen.  Soooo sloooowwww.  I have 10-year old computers for my kids that run programs and load pages faster than this piece of junk brand new.  Pretty much giving up on Dell at this point.
